product_name: Garmin vivofit 2 Wireless Activity Tracker and Heart Rate Monitor Bundle
long_description: A personal health coach right at your wrist, the vivofit 2 with Heart Rate Monitor lets you track your activity level, sleep and your heart rate while you work out, all with low-profile style.
short_description: A personal health coach right at your wrist, the vivofit 2 with Heart Rate Monitor lets you track your activity level, sleep and your heart rate while you work out, all with low-profile style.
